translation: "When a Brahmā King Buddha is wholeheartedly revered, that person's 30,000 to 600 eons of birth-and-death sins are forgiven.

source_sentence: 「不退轉輪成首佛，一心敬禮者，却千億劫生死之罪。
translation: "The nonretrogressing Wheel-Turning Chief Buddha, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of a hundred billion eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「大與光明佛，一心敬禮者，却八萬六千劫生死之罪。
translation: "Greatly endowed with radiance, the Buddha is venerated with one heart, but it will prevent the sins of 86,000 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「法種尊佛，一心敬禮者，却四百九劫生死之罪。
translation: "When the Dharmâkara Buddha is worshipped with one heart, it will prevent the transgression of 4,900 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「成首佛、與光明佛、法種尊佛、寶藏莊嚴佛。
translation: "They are the Chief Buddha, the Radiant Buddha, the Dharma-seed Honored Buddha, and the Jewel-treasure Adornment Buddha.

source_sentence: 「現在南方一百五十佛名。」
translation: "One hundred fifty buddhas are now named in the south."

source_sentence: 佛言：「若善男子、善女人聞南方佛名，不懷疑結、信悟道眼執持禮拜者，於現在世中功德具足，逮得五法：一者、除去吾我，常值佛世；二者、獲尊勢轉輪聖王；三者、逮得總持執御經典，誠信無量；四者、成三十二大人之相，至得佛道眾行備悉；五者、遂五神通無所弊礙；是為五事。
translation: The Buddha said, "If good sons and good women hear the name of the southern Buddha and don't harbor bonds of doubt and faith, realize the eye of the path, maintain it, and venerate it, they'll be fully endowed with five qualities in the present life: first, they'll be rid of self and always rejoin the Buddha world; second, they'll attain the venerable power of the wheel-turning sage king; third, they'll attain the general maintenance, discipline, and sincerity of the sutras; fourth, they'll achieve the thirty-two major characteristics of a great personage and attain the full range of the Buddha's path; and fifth, they'll attain the five supernormal powers without any hindrance; these are the five things.

source_sentence: 若有女人聞此佛名，至心禮敬，則離女身生淨佛土，神通具足，能却七百萬億劫生死之罪。
translation: If a woman hears the name of this Buddha and wholeheartedly venerates him, she'll be freed from the body of a woman and be born in a pure Buddha land with complete spiritual powers that can undo the sins of birth-and-death for seven hundred million million eons.

source_sentence: 佛告舍利弗：「若善男子、善女人，得聞此諸如來名者，曾已供養過去諸佛，應當一心信樂持念，當超廣遠無量歡喜安立其意令使真諦，以千萬信樂之心念諸如來，其人當得無量之福，永當遠離三塗之厄，命終之後皆當後彼諸佛剎。
translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra, "If good sons and good women who hear the names of these tathāgatas and have made offerings to the buddhas of the past should whole-heartedly believe in and happily maintain their mind, rejoice in the exceedingly vast and immeasurable, establish their intention, make it true, and remember the tathāgatas with a faithful mind of a thousand million [buddhas], they'll attain immeasurable merit, be permanently freed from the misery of the three destinies, and will all end up in one of those buddha bases when their lives end.

source_sentence: 命終之時彼諸如來持諸大眾，住其人前說法教化令不退轉，必成正覺。
translation: When his life ends, those tathāgatas will support a large group of people who will stay in front of him to teach and instruct him, so that he doesn't turn away and will surely become perfectly enlightened.

source_sentence: 其有人聞稱揚讚嘆是諸如來功德名字而生誹謗當墮地獄，百五萬劫具受眾苦，若有受持一心不捨禮拜供敬滅千萬億劫生死之罪。
translation: Anyone who hears these tathāgatas' names praised and their merits denigrated will go to hell and suffer a hundred or fifty-thousand eons of suffering, but if they accept and uphold them with one heart and don't abandon worship and offer veneration, they'll be saved from the thousand million eons of birth-and-death sins.

translation: "Jewel-covered Shōkū Buddha, if you whole-heartedly venerate it, you'll be saved from the sins of six hundred eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「妙寶佛，一心敬禮者，却八千劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Sublime Jewel Buddha, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of 8,000 eons of birth-and-death.

translation: "The Buddha of the Truth Banner, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of 896 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「梵憶佛，一心敬禮者，却六十七却生死之罪。
translation: "The Buddha of Brahmā's Recollection, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of sixty-seven eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「現在西方一百五十佛名。」
translation: "Now there are 150 names of buddhas in the West."

source_sentence: 佛言：「若有善男子、善女人學菩薩道，聞此佛名不生疑網，篤信敬事者，所生之處致演光明三昧正定，尋復逮得無量三昧門。
translation: The Buddha said, "If there are good sons and good women who train on the bodhisattva path and hear the Buddha's name, don't develop a web of doubt, and devote themselves to faith and reverence, the place where they arise will cause them to evolve a radiant samādhi and right concentration, and they'll then acquire measureless samādhi gates.

source_sentence: 「寶火佛，一心敬禮者，其人立得不退轉，疾得成佛道。
translation: "When a person wholeheartedly venerates a jeweled fire Buddha, he or she will immediately become irreversible and quickly achieve the Buddha Way.

source_sentence: 「淨月憧稱光明佛，一心敬禮者，却百六十劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Vairocana-raśmi-pratimaṇḍitā Buddha, who is venerated with one heart, will be spared the sins of one hundred and sixty eons of birth and death.

source_sentence: 「阿彌陀佛，聞名一心信樂誦念歡喜，得無量福，離三惡道，臨終至念佛自來迎。
translation: "Amitâbha Buddha, when he hears his name and wholeheartedly believes in it, recites it with joy and happiness, attains measureless merit, parts with the three evil destinies, and comes to meet the mindfulness of the Buddha when he reaches his final destination.

source_sentence: 「殊勝佛，聞名歡喜信樂誦念，能降魔眾，却六十劫生死之罪。
translation: "Jñānacitra Buddha, when you hear his name and joyfully recite it with faith and happiness, you'll be able to subdue Māra's multitude and save yourself from the sins of 60 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「集音佛，聞名歡喜信誦念，其人得佛音聲眾中說法，却八十劫生死之罪。
translation: "When he hears his name, the Buddha's joyful, faithful recitation will enable him to preach among the multitude of people with the Buddha's voice, which will save him from the sins of 80 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「金剛步精進佛，一心敬禮者，却百劫生死之罪。
translation: "Vajraśekhara Buddha, who whole-heartedly venerates and worships him, will be spared the sin of a hundred eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「造王神通尖華佛、早王神通佛、無量憣佛、淨日憶稱光佛、度一切世間苦惱大光普佛、善建立珠臺王佛、寶幡佛、普光升勝臺王佛、淨光佛、雷舍挪佛、普賢花敷佛、寶上佛、樹根華佛、莊嚴通佛、維越莊嚴佛。
translation: "He creates the King of Avatar's Pointing Flower Buddha, the Early King of Avatars, the Buddha of Immeasurable Excellency, the Buddha of Pure Sun Recollection, the Buddha of Great Light and Universal Relief, the King of Well-Built Jewels, the Buddha of Jewel Banners, the King of Universally Radiant Ascendants, the Buddha of Pure Light, the Buddha of Leshano, the Buddha of the Layers of Universal Goodness, the Buddha of Jewel-Arising, the Buddha of Tree Roots and Flowers, the Buddha of Adorned Power, and the Buddha of Vairocana Adorned.

source_sentence: 「自在王神通佛，一心敬禮者，却五十九劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Mahātejas garuḍêndra Buddha, who is wholeheartedly venerated, will be spared the sins of fifty-nine eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「度一切世間苦惱佛、須彌相佛、多摩羅跋旃檀香神通佛、大悲光明佛、蓮華樹世界長精進佛。
translation: "He is the Buddha who liberates all worldly sufferings, the Sumeru-phase Buddha, the Tamālapatra-candana-gandhâbhijña Buddha, the Buddha of Great Compassionate Light, and the Buddha of Long-lasting Effort in the Lotus World.

source_sentence: 「妙樂佛，一心敬禮者，却五百劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Buddha of Wonderful Bliss, who is worshipped with a single-minded devotion, will be saved from the sins of 500 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「無量幢幡佛，一心敬禮者，却五百劫生死之罪。
translation: "Banner Buddha of Limitless Banners, when you venerate him with one mind, you'll be saved from the sins of 500 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「無量幢佛，一心敬禮者，却八十劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Buddha of Measureless Banners, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of 80 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「大光普遍佛，一心敬禮者，却九十二劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Buddha of Immeasurable Light and Universality, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of ninety-two eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「寶幢佛，一心敬禮者，却七十九劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Ratnaketu Buddha, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of seventy-nine eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「淨光佛，一心敬禮者，却二百劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Buddha of Pure Light, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of 200 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「寶上佛，一心敬禮者，却百八十一劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Jewel-Shaped Buddha, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of 181 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「樹根華王佛，一心敬禮者，却三百十三劫生死之罪。
translation: "Tree Root Flower King Buddha, when he venerates with one heart, he's prevented from committing 313 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「維越莊嚴佛，一心敬禮者，却九百劫生死之罪。
translation: "Vaiśravaṇa, when he venerates and worships it with one heart, it will prevent the sins of birth-and-death for 900 eons.

source_sentence: 「無量明佛。
translation: "The Buddha of Immeasurable Luminosity.

source_sentence: 「現在西北方一百五十佛名。」
translation: "The name of the Buddha is 150 buddhas to the northwest of now."

source_sentence: 佛告阿逸多：「若族姓子、族姓女，得聞此諸如來名號，信樂歡喜、受持諷誦、作禮之者，曾已奉見五十萬佛。
translation: The Buddha told Ajita, "If a clansman or clanswoman hears the names of these tathāgatas, is faithful, happy, memorizes, recites, and venerates them, they've once met half a million buddhas.

source_sentence: 其人所生之處，常得天眼見十方剎，常得耳聞無量音，身能飛行歷事諸佛，心常能知一切所念，乃至泥洹，不生下賤貧窮之處，不生三惡八難之處，身如金剛具眾相好，心樂大法眾所愛敬，轉身所生不離諸佛。
translation: Where they are born, they'll always have divine vision to see the buddhas of the ten directions, always have ears to hear measureless sounds, be able to fly and serve the buddhas, always know what's on their mind, and reach nirvāṇa; they won't be born in a low and poor place, won't be born in one of the three evils and eight difficulties, have a body like adamant with many features and beauties, have a mind that's delighted with the great Dharma and is beloved by everyone, and won't be free of the buddhas when they are reborn.

source_sentence: 是故，阿逸！
translation: Therefore, Āyatollah!

source_sentence: 其有恭敬諸佛名號禮拜之者，所得功德唯佛能知，永脫生死千萬億劫生死之罪。
translation: Those who venerate the names of the buddhas and worship them will attain merit that only the buddhas can know and will be freed forever from the sins of a thousand million eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 佛言：「若族姓男女學菩薩乘，聞此佛名信樂不疑，喜心敬事者，所生之處逮得種種三昧，覩見十方各十恒河沙諸佛，亦使現世離諸狂橫，怨毒除滅，行道日進，心中善願應念皆得，遇善知識獲深法忍，所生之處常為人尊，至成佛道終不受苦，能滅三十萬億阿僧祇生死之罪。
translation: The Buddha said, "If a clansman or a man who trains in the bodhisattva vehicle and hears the name of this Buddha and is faithful, happy, and respectful, the place where he's born will acquire various samādhis, see ten buddhas of the Ganges River in each of the ten directions, rid the present world of frenzies, cease enmity, advance in practice day by day, obtain every good wish in his mind, meet a good teacher, attain profound tolerance of the Dharma, and always become the honored one wherever he's born, never suffering until he attains the Buddha Way, and be able to extinguish the 30,000,000 incalculable sins of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「德內豐嚴佛，聞名歡喜信樂誦念，一心作禮，得不退轉，疾成正覺，却一劫生死，後生得六通、得端政，常尊貴，能除欲縛六情常無病，生常值佛聞法見僧，離八難，常具淨戒，心不亂，乃至涅槃。
translation: "When they hear the name of the Buddha of Inner Abundance, they rejoice, believe, recite, and recite it with joy, whole-heartedly pay homage, become irreversible, quickly attain right awakening, and escape an eon of birth and death; in later births, they attain the six powers and attain dignified government, always honored, able to remove the bonds of desire and the six emotions, always without illness, always born to meet the Buddha, hear the Dharma, see the saṃgha, part with the eight difficulties, always equipped with pure morality, and not distracted in mind, all the way to nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 「金剛堅固消伏壞嚴佛，聞名歡喜信樂誦念，得不退轉，却十萬億之罪。
translation: "Vajrāṭṭhita, the resolute, subduing, and destructive Adornment Buddha, when he hears his name, rejoices, believes, delights, and recites it, attains irreversibility, and is able to subdue a hundred thousand million sins.

source_sentence: 「寶火佛，聞名歡喜信樂誦念，得不退轉，疾成正覺。
translation: "Jewel-Fire Buddha, when he hears his name and recites it joyfully, faithfully, and joyfully, he attains irreversibility and quickly becomes fully awakened.

source_sentence: 「寶月光明佛，聞名信樂持諷誦念，後生得中正定，自見諸佛轉尊法輪。
translation: "Jewel Moonlight Buddha, when he hears his name and joyfully recites and chants it, he attains right concentration in the intermediate stage in later life and sees the buddhas themselves turning the honored Dharma wheel.

source_sentence: 「賢最佛，聞名歡喜樂持諷誦念，後生端正，自識宿命，得成正覺。
translation: "The most noble of the buddhas, when he hears the name, is delighted and joyful, recites it, recites it, and gives rise to correctness in later life, realizes for himself his past lives, and attains right awakening.

source_sentence: 「寶蓮華步佛，聞名信樂誦念，所生之處當為一切所敬，言教承用；一心敬禮者，能令女人得為男子，成阿維越致。
translation: "The Jeweled Lotus Padmôttara Buddha, when he hears his name and recites it with joy and faith, the place where he's born will be respected by all, and his words and teachings will be used; someone who whole-heartedly venerates him will cause a woman to become a man and become an aviator.

source_sentence: 佛告舍利弗：「若族姓子、族姓女，其有聞此諸佛名號，歡喜信樂諷誦禮敬之者，所得功德勝於一切布施、諸餘功德十萬億倍，諸佛國土隨意往生，不退轉成最正覺。
translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra, "If clansmen and clanswomen hear the names of these buddhas and rejoice, believe, recite, recite, and venerate them, the merit they will attain will be ten thousand million times greater than all the generosity and other merits, and they'll be reborn at will in the lands of the buddhas and become the most awakened without turning back.

source_sentence: 若有誹謗懷疑不信者，當墮虛[蔝-米+(日/(句-口+匕))]渥犁，六萬億歲中受無量罪；其有信樂稱嘆禮拜，現世安隱，滅五百千萬億劫生死之罪。
translation: Anyone who denigrates, doubts, or doesn't believe will fall into the [Xuan [kuṅgala-meeting + (sun/(kuṅgala-mouth + dagger))] Vālva and suffer measureless sins for six thousand million years, while someone who is faithful, happy, praises, and venerates him will be tranquil in the present life and be saved from the sins of birth-and-death for five hundred thousand million million eons.

translation: "Destroy Māra's Net and Stand Alone Buddha, and those who whole-heartedly venerate it will be saved from the sins of a hundred eons of birth and death.

source_sentence: 「師子吼力佛，一心敬禮者，却二百一十劫生死之罪。
translation: "Shizi-roaring Power Buddha, if you wholeheartedly venerate him, you'll be saved from the sins of 210 eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「悲精進佛，一心敬禮者，却千億劫生死之罪。
translation: "The Buddha of Compassionate Strenuous Effort, when venerated with one heart, will prevent the sins of a hundred billion eons of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「三乘行佛、金剛堅強自在王佛、梵天佛。
translation: "The buddhas of the three vehicles' practices, the Vajrajñāta-rāja-svara-rāja, and the Brahmā gods.

source_sentence: 「現在上方一百五十佛名。」
translation: "There are one hundred and fifty names of buddhas above us now."

source_sentence: 佛言：「若族姓子、族姓女學菩薩乘，聞此佛名心無結網，信吾道眼之所斑宣者，世世所生未曾懈怠，不習貪欲，常以菩薩為父妻子兄弟親族，在在所生身未曾離三十二相，亦得往生諸佛國土，少婬怒癡身無疾病，一切功德皆得成就，三十五萬恒河沙劫罪皆得消滅。
translation: The Buddha said, "If clansmen and clanswomen who train in the bodhisattva vehicle hear this Buddha's name and hear it with a mind without webs and believe in what my eye of the Way reveals, they'll be born throughout the ages, never become lazy, never cultivate craving, always regard bodhisattvas as fathers, wives, brothers, relatives, and never part with the thirty-two marks in the body they're born in, and they'll be reborn in the lands of the buddhas, have little lust, anger, and delusion, have no illness, attain all merits, and have their sins vanquished in 350,000 Gaṅgā eons.
